text: The Copper Cistern is an oil painting on oak by Jean-Baptiste-Siméon-Chardin. It was painted in around 1735. It measures 28.5 cm x 23 cm (11.22 in x 9.06 in). It hangs in the Louvre. Chardin chose themes that were popular with all classes of 18th century Parisian society. ==References== * Category:1730s paintings Category:Paintings by Jean-Baptiste-Siméon Chardin Category:1735
title: The Copper Cistern
